title: Pana Miguel
description: Pana Miguel is a discord bot I created for my discord server. It has lots of personalised functions for the server including games.

title: Fight Game
briefDescription: Fight Game / Battle Buddy Simulatorâ€‹ / Battle
description:
This game has had lots of names so I refer to it with its prototype one, Fight Game. This game was made for some people from Fiverr. I've been working with them since November 2020. The game is still in development and I'm constantly releasing new updates.

Note:
I'm not the owner of the game. I've made all the game (I've had help from some friends to make some 3D models) and I'm still working on it. But the real owner is the people that pay me to develop the game. You can visit their group from the game page.

title: Mestik's Store
description: Mestik's Store was created in summer 2020. I already had experience in creating Minecraft skins so I tried making Roblox clothing for 2 months. The store made lots of Robux and still sells items so it can be considered a success.

title: Mine Game
briefDescription: Mine Game could be considered a tapping game with more complexity. It was my first solo professional game.
description: In Arshield Studios Marcos was busy with another project so I had to make this game all by myself. In this game, you can mine minerals, sell them and use the money to upgrade your pickaxe or to buy some items.

title: GIVER Parkour
briefDescription: This is my first professional game. It was made for the YouTuber Robux Giver.
description: Arshield Studios was contacted by Robux Giver to create a game for his youtube subscribers. We made the game in about a week. This was the first project I've worked on professionally.

title: Arshield Studios Tycoon [BETA]
briefDescription: This is the first Tycoon made by Arshield Studios and my first Roblox game.
description: In summer 2020 I founded Arshield Studios with a friend, Marcos. We developed our first Roblox Game: Arshield Studios Tycoon [BETA]. It is a simple tycoon. You have a factory in which you can produce spheres that then are sold automatically.

title: Zombie Blower
briefDescription: Zombie Blower was created for a game jam. It's a top-down shooter in which you have to decide if you want to stun or to push you enemies as you cant kill them.
description:
Zombie Blower is a top-down shooter created for the CPB Jam in 2020. In this game you can't kill the enemies, you can just push them and stun them. So you will have to decide which one is more important.
This game was made in Unity in less than 2 days.
You can play the game from the browser without downloading anything. You just have to press the play button in the upper part of the page.


Future Plans:
 I'm thinking of making a port for Android.

title: Space Program Simulator
briefDescription: Space Program Simulator is a physics test. It tries to simulate general relativity.
description:
Space Program Simulator was created inspired by the Android game Space Flight Simulator. It was going to be a space rocket builder but it ended being a simple physics simulator.
It tries to simulate general relativity removing all the non-relative positions.

title: Empyre 2019
briefDescription: Empyre 2019 is a prototype of a game I've been wanting to make for a long time. It didn't end its development because I didn't have enough experience yet.
description: In June 2018 some friends of mine and I had an idea for a game. We would play on multiplayer each one ruling over their own country. We could attack each other, develop our countries, upgrade our infrastructure, etc. At the time I didn't have the skill to finish it. I tried to make it once again in 2019 but abandoned the project for lack of interest.

title: Gravity Ball 3D
briefDescription: Gravity Ball 3D is a game published in 2018 in which you have to change the gravity to avoid crashing into obstacles.
description: In this game, you'll have to change the gravity to avoid the dangerous red blocks. With w, a, s and d you can change the gravity and with space, you can use the special ability. You can collect coins to buy skins, including Ricardo.
